sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-description', templateUrl: './description.component.html', styleUrls: ['./description.component.css'], }) export class DescriptionComponent implements OnInit { age: number = 0; birthdate = new Date('1998-08-14'); ngOnInit(): void { this.calculateAge(); } calculateAge() { let timeDiff = Math.abs(Date.now() - this.birthdate.getTime()); let age = Math.floor(timeDiff / (1000 * 3600 * 24) / 365.25); // console.log(age); this.age = age; } }

about me


Hello there! I’m Danny, a tech enthusiast and problem solver with a deep passion for the ever-evolving world of technology. I am currently {{ age }} years old. I embarked on my journey in the realm of computer science at the University of Toronto, where I graduated in 2020. Armed with a degree and a burning curiosity, I dove headfirst into the exciting and dynamic field of technology.

My fascination with technology goes beyond mere interest; it’s a driving force that fuels my creativity and innovation. I am captivated by the way technology shapes our lives, connecting us in ways previously unimaginable. In the rapidly changing landscape of the digital age, I find myself constantly inspired to explore, learn, and create.

During my academic years, I honed my skills in computer science, mastering various programming languages and delving into the intricacies of software development. My time at the University of Toronto not only provided me with a solid foundation in computer science principles but also nurtured my ability to think critically and solve complex problems. These skills have become the cornerstone of my professional journey.

This website serves as a platform to share my insights, experiences, and projects with the world. Here, you’ll find a collection of my thoughts on the latest tech trends, detailed explorations of innovative projects, and perhaps a glimpse into the future of technology as I see it.
